channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: This Next Generation IVF Startup Facilitated The Birth Of A Baby For The First Time
item.description: Doctors say IVF technology developed by Gameto, cofounded by Under 30 alumna Dina Radenkovic, has serious potential. Now it’s finally coming to market...

item.title: See Christmas Lights In The Sky As ‘Star Of Bethlehem’ Shines: The Night Sky This Week
item.description: Each Monday, I pick out North America’s celestial highlights for the week ahead (which also applies to northern hemisphere mid-northern latitudes).

item.title: The opportunity for AI formbots

item.title: AI’s Power Demands Aren't Equal: Industrial AI’s Impact On Energy Efficiency
item.description: As companies work to navigate the energy transition going forward, AI will play a crucial role.

item.title: What Developers Can Learn From The Nasadiya Sukta About AI Sentience
item.description: The Nasadiya Sukta and Svayambhu remind us that the journey to sentient AI is also philosophical—not just technical.
